content.description: Sit start with a pair of edges and crumbly feet out right. From there, work up and slight left to edges, then continue up the bumps to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad. This has a great landing.
content.location: Climb the southernmost section of Tommyknocker's east face.

content.description: Sit start matched on a sidepull. From there, gain and match on an edge, trend left along the lip to a decent set of bumps, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Tommyknocker.

content.description: Sit start matched with a pair of edge. From there, bump up to a pair of edges immediately above the start holds, make a big move to an edge, match, gain the bumps on top, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is great though.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Tommyknocker.

content.description: Sit start with a left hand undercling and a high right hand edge. From there, gain a left hand edge, follow to a globular right hand, reach a thin left and right hand edge below the lip, gain the bumps on top, and mantel aboard the boulder.
content.protection: A pad will work fine. The landing is quite good.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Tommyknocker.

content.description: Squat start matched on a sloping edge with poor feet (the sit start looks like an option if you're capable enough as well). From there, pop up to the intermediate shelf, match on it, bring the feet along, work past the sloping lip above to some good bumps, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is good, but there are some rocks surrounding it. The tree directly behind works better than most spots.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Tommyknocker. There is a small tree directly behind the problem.

content.description: Sit start matched on a sidepull-edge. From there, work up and right through edges to the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pad. It has a great landing.
content.location: It climbs the northernmost section of Tommyknocker's east face.
